resources.string: first touch activates the sudoku field, second touch opens the input dialog
Attention: Changing the difficulty level starts a new game!
each number on the sudoku grid automatically sets marks vertical, horizontal and group wise
on pressing HINT, a sudoku field gets activated (as easy touch), marking a field, where a number or a mark can be set
if 8 marks are displayed, the sudoku field gets activated
if a specific number is missing only once in 9 marks vertical, horizontal or group wise, the sudoku field gets activated
if a number is bound to the intersection of a row/column and a group, in the same row/column or group marks are not already set, a sudoku field with a possible new mark gets activated
if in a group/row/column are n fields with the same n marks or less missing, marks can be set on the same numbers on the other fields, a sudoku field with a possible new mark gets activated
if in a group/row/column are n missing marks distributed over n fields only, then marks can be set on the other numbers on the same n fields, a sudoku field with a possible new mark gets activated
mark fields with a input not equal to the solution\n(duplicate inputs vertical, horizontal or group wise get marked by default)
let the device play for you
if 8 marks are displayed, the missing number is inserted into the sudoku field
if a number is missing only once in 9 marks vertical, horizontal or group wise, it gets inserted into the sudoku field
if a number is bound to the intersection of a row/column and a group, in the same row/column or group marks are not already set, all possible new marks derived get marked
if in a group/row/column are n fields with the same n marks or less missing, marks are set on the same numbers on the other fields
if in a group/row/column are n missing marks distributed over n fields only, then marks are set on the other numbers on the same n fields
